changelogversion.changelogtext: Added custom round to value, you might have to set it again in settings!
Tried fixing TM being lowered, please contact me if the problem still occurs
Fixed workouts sometimes resetting while in progress
Use training max as base for everything instead of the one RM, hopefully this won't cause any problems for anyone
Re-added the title for the notes dialog
Stopped the hint in old workouts to show over and over
Rewrote the core of the application. No (hopefully) functional difference, but major improvements to make it easier for future updates
